title: No Pogačar, No Problem: UAE’s Rising Stars Outgun Vingegaard and Roglič
content:
UAE slots 3 into top-10 to derail the hyped ‘Big 2’ duel between Vingegaard and Roglič in key Volta ao Algarve mountain finale.

Read the full article at No Pogačar, No Problem: UAE’s Rising Stars Outgun Vingegaard and Roglič on Velo.
author: ahood
